body_html:
I cloned from that PR (your fork) and tried to build but found an error even earlier. Looks like ideep.hpp isn't getting picked up?

body:
I cloned from that PR (your fork) and tried to build but found an error even earlier. Looks like `ideep.hpp` isn't getting picked up?

```
[ 41%] Linking CXX static library ../lib/libcaffe2_protos.a

          ^~~~~~~~~~~
compilation terminated.
```
